#Text=THE POT OF GOLD
#Text=Mary had not been in the Dolan home an hour until Katy knew all she could tell of her trouble .
#Text=Mrs. Dolan was practical .
#Text=" Go to see Father Michael , " she said .
#Text=" What 's he for but to hilp us .

#Text=I warn you before you begin that I cannot sanction your marriage to a Protestant .

_	_	_	_

#Text= Oh , but I 'm going to convart him ! " cried Mary so quickly that the priest laughed harder than ever .

column1: #Text=" So that 's the lay of the land ! "
#Text=he chuckled .
#Text=" Well , if you 'll guarantee that , I 'll give in .

column3:
_	_	_	_

#Text= Not until we get Dannie 's consint , " answered Mary , and for the first her voice wavered .

column1: #Text=Father Michael looked his surprise .
#Text=" Tut !
#Text=" Dannie is the finest man that will ever live in this world , " said Mary , " but he do n't want to marry me . "
#Text=" To my certain knowledge Dannie has loved you all your life , " said Father Michael .
#Text=" He wants nothing here or hereafter as he wants to marry you . "
#Text=" Thin why do n't he till me so ? " sobbed Mary , burying her burning face in her hands .
#Text=" Has he said nothing to you ? "
#Text=gravely inquired the priest .
#Text=" No , he has n't and I do n't belave he intinds to , " answered Mary , wiping her eyes and trying to be composed .
#Text=" There is something about Jimmy that is holding him back .

#Text=Mrs. Dolan thought you 'd help me .

_	_	_	_

#Text= What do you want me to do , Mary ? " asked Father Michael .

column1: #Text=" Two things , " answered Mary promptly .
#Text=" I want you to tell me what Jimmy confissed to you before he died , and then I want you to talk to Dannie and show him that he is free from any promise that Jimmy might have got out of him .

column3:
_	_	_	_

#Text= A dying confession -- " began the priest .

column1: #Text=" Yes , but I know -- " broke in Mary .

#Text=" I saw them fight , and I heard Jimmy till Dannie that he 'd lied to him to separate us , but he turned right around and took it back and I knew Dannie belaved him thin ; but he ca n't after Jimmy confissed it again to both of you . "
#Text=" What do you mean by ' saw them fight ? ' "
#Text=Father Michael was leaning toward Mary anxiously .
#Text=Mary told him .
#Text=" Then that is the explanation to the whole thing , " said the priest .
#Text=" Dannie did believe Jimmy when he took it back , and he died before he could repeat to Dannie what he had told me .

#Text= Your suffering is over , " continued the priest .

column1: #Text=" You have many good years yet that you may spend with Dannie ; God will give you living children , I am sure .
